kizuna_botan_a_02: Hurry up and hide! And keep quiet, OK?[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_a_04:
Um... Yeah, you know, I’m just... Errr...\c
*sigh*
Guess I might as well come clean.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_a_07:
Ah. Sorry. Your jump scare earlier completely
frazzled me. My brain’s still trying to reboot.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_a_08:
All right, here’s the sitch. Team Star’ve started
coming to school again...[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_a_09:
But I don’t know if they’re gonna fit in OK, and
it’s been playing on my mind, you know?\r
So I’m checking on them from over here...[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_a_aku_01:
Hmph... Guess we’re still not exactly gettin’ a
warm welcome here, huh?[npcn:21]
kizuna_botan_a_fairy_02:
Sure, the teachers finally figured out we’re not a
bunch of delinquents...[npcn:20]
kizuna_botan_a_fairy_03:
But it’s not like we can press some magic button
to make everyone else accept us.[npcn:20]
kizuna_botan_a_aku_02:
True story. We gotta fix this, my man. Time for a
change of tack![npcn:21]
kizuna_botan_a_10:
Huh? A change of tack...?\c
What, are they gonna start wearing normal school
uniforms so they stop scaring off the other kids?[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_a_11:
Oh, Momo... Ortie... They’re both really trying
their best to fit in here at school...[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_a_fairy_04:
A “change of tack,” huh? What exactly are
you suggesting?[npcn:20]
kizuna_botan_a_aku_04:
How ’bout we say a big, friendly howdy to
everyone here? Like, just yell it. Loud as we can.[npcn:21]
kizuna_botan_a_fairy_05:
WHAT?! That’s stupid! Go on and embarrass
yourself if you want to, but count me out![npcn:20]
kizuna_botan_a_12: Errr. Yeah, that idea seems a bit...off.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_a_aku_06:
You know Ryme, right? She does this at her
concerts, no joke.[npcn:21]
kizuna_botan_a_aku_07:
If the crowd ain’t hyped at the start of the show,
she’ll shout the loudest greetin’ you ever heard\r
into the mike. Like “S’UP Y’ALL” or whatever!\c
Lifts the mood like nobody’s business.[npcn:21]
kizuna_botan_a_fairy_06:
Yeah, that makes sense. ’Cause those are
CONCERTS. This is SCHOOL. It’s different.[npcn:20]
kizuna_botan_a_aku_08:
OK, smart guy. So we’re optin’ for the cold
shoulder treatment forever, then, are we?[npcn:21]
kizuna_botan_a_aku_09:
It would, wouldn’t it? So yeah. Our only option is
to yell at everyone so they know we’re nice.\r
Here, I’m gonna go for it...[npcn:21]
kizuna_botan_a_aku_10:
HEEEY!!! MORNIN’, Y’AAAAAALL!!!
HOW WE ALL FEELIN’ TODAAAY??!![npcn:21]
kizuna_botan_a_fairy_08:
Oh nooo! Giacomo! What are you DOING?!
This is SO embarrassing![npcn:20]
kizuna_botan_a_aku_11:
EVERYONE HAVIN’ A GOOD TIIIIIIME??!!
C’mon, Ortega—you gotta do it, too![npcn:21]
kizuna_botan_a_fairy_09:
Hold on a sec! You...you’re just practicing for
your DJ sets, aren’t you?[npcn:20]
kizuna_botan_a_aku_12:
THANKS FOR COMIN’ TONIGHT!!!
Quick! Say it![npcn:21]
kizuna_botan_a_fairy_11:
...HEY! What do you mean, “thanks for coming”?!
We’re not hosting anything![npcn:20]
kizuna_botan_a_mob_01:
Are those guys from Team Star? What the heck
are they yelling for?
kizuna_botan_a_mob_02:
Is this some kind of skit? Heh...they’re pretty
funny!
kizuna_botan_a_mob_03: I guess they’re not as scary as I thought...?
kizuna_botan_a_15:
P-people are actually warming up to them?!
Why? That makes zero sense![npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_a_16:
Haaah... Momo and Ortie really are operating
on a different level. I’m kind of amazed.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_a_17: Seems all my worrying was for nothing, huh?[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_a_18:
Now that that’s all settled, I guess I should get
going. Hasta la vistar! ☆[npcn:8]
